website_summaries.verdict: A full-size lap steel guitar for experienced players.
pros: 36 frets provide excellent tonal range for a 6-string model
The swamp ash body and P90 "soapbar" pickup produce impressive clarity, and the guitar has a removable stand and gig bag for performing
cons: Some users find the threads in the supporting legs to be easily cross-threaded, so use caution during assembly and setup

customer_reviews.title: Nice beginning to intermittent lap steel
customer_reviews.text: Got here very quickly, was just as I expected. Have it mated to a Roland cube amp and sounds very good. For someone who is looking for a decent lap steel and don't want to spend hundreds ithink you would be happy. Amazon service was great as normal.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Fordyce

customer_reviews.title: The guitar is beautiful. I'm impressed with the case also
customer_reviews.text: The guitar is beautiful. I'm impressed with the case also. Have not played for 50 years, but enjoy playing this guitar daily. Thanks. Very good buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I can't imagine a better entry level instrument.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle McKinzey

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to keep in tune
customer_reviews.text: Not easy to keep in tune, but the value is insane... lap steel, legs, and gig bag to store it all. It's well made and sounds great.. just gotta watch the feedback when using overdrive/distortion effects.
customer_reviews.author: M. C. Ambrosini

customer_reviews.title: Everything arrived on time and as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I am new at this instrument. It will be a challenge. The challenge is one of the reasons I purchased it. Very happy with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Grafx24

customer_reviews.title: High class Instument, right down to the finish/ & Pick Ups!
customer_reviews.text: Looks like about a $500.00 Rig to me! Plays well also. Just as soon as I learn how to play them right.
customer_reviews.author: JBZJAMS

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Did not disappoint! Sounds great, great into instrument into lap-steel, awesome value for the price.

customer_reviews.title: well made
customer_reviews.text: My first time for a steel guitar so I have a lot to learn,

customer_reviews.title: Was delivered in early and in good shape.
customer_reviews.text: My lap steel guitar came earlier than I expected, it's really a nice looking instrument and sounds great.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful instrument and sound!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful musical instrument with a unique and beautil sound. A little heavy to carry for a petite woman with small hands. Thank you

customer_reviews.title: could be a 5
customer_reviews.text: this would be a five if it didn't have a hum. I expected silence with a humbucker pickup.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so it is good enough for now
customer_reviews.text: I am learning the basics of a steel guitar. so it is good enough for now.
customer_reviews.author: Al Gibeau

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Mine came with a couple of minor scratches in the finish, but otherwise it is a beautiful instrument and very fun to play.
customer_reviews.author: MrGizmo

customer_reviews.title: it will be ok just disappointed about broke string
customer_reviews.text: one of the strings was broke when I opened up box. the bag that the lap steel came in I give that a 10. it will be ok just disappointed about broke string.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really like it
customer_reviews.text: This thing is beautiful and has a really good sound
customer_reviews.author: J. Kinsey

customer_reviews.title: Very happy! Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Very happy! Excellent quality, sounds great, awesome value for $120! I recommend this fine guitar to any musician that loves the sound of lap steel guitar.
customer_reviews.author: Javier Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and finish
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and finish. Must tune every time, sometimes half way through a session. Sustain is excellent. Tone through my Peavey Nashville 112 is excellent. Like string spacing. Intonation was spot on. Bridge overly complex...will make string changes unnecessarily difficult. Legs work fine. Terrific gig bag. Really love the guitar, especially at this price point. Play several times a day. Using mostly E7th. (Would like to get an 8 string console in C6th next, but am not crazy about the Rondo natural ash finish). Well done!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis J.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic quality for the money. Plays really well and sounds great
customer_reviews.author: Zack

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic deal. Love it
customer_reviews.text: Purchased by my daughter for her dad. Fantastic deal. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Clementi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The case was nice, and it is a good size.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca gallegos

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Thanks amazing you have done great with my guitar 5 stars

customer_reviews.title: One heck of a value and sound
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned when I purchased this lap steel several months back that it might not be the best quality, but I've really been pleased with its sound.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen J. Wheat

customer_reviews.title: Best deal and quit the steel
customer_reviews.text: Best deal and quit the steel, pun intended. You can not beat the value here anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: loowood2 on YT

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Mine is a bit noisy, but overall it plays nice and stays in tune. The legs feel decently sturdy and everything packs up nice into the bag.
customer_reviews.author: steve hauke

product_meta.title: SX Lap 2 Ash 3TS Electric Lap Steel Guitar w/Bag
product_meta.description: This full size American swamp ash body lap steel features 36 frets and offers a single coil pickup for clear and bright sound. Unlike a typical guitar, the strings of a lap steel are not pressed to a fret when sounding a note; rather, the player holds a metal slide called a steel (or tone bar) in one hand, which is moved along the strings to change the instrument's pitch while the other hand plucks or picks the strings. It is perfect for Blues, Rock, Hawaiian, Country, Bluegrass, and Western Swing. The strings are spaced widely, with 3/8" between each one. This makes it very easy and enjoyable to play. The single coil pickup has 8K ohm resistance. Measurements Overall length: 36 1/2" Body length: 13" Scale length: 24 3/4" Width at lower bout: 8 3/4" Width at upper bout: 6 9/16" Body length 13 3/4" Width at the nut: 2 5/16" Width at the 12th fret: 2 5/8" Width at the 20th fret 2 7/8" Body thickness: 1" String spacing at the nut: 1/4" (2 1/16" overall) String spacing at the bridge 3/8" (2 3/4" overall) String sizes: .010,.015,.017,.022w,.028,.032,.038,.052
feature_bullets: A full size 36 fret lap steel guitar
American swamp ash body with rosewood fretboard
Diecast chrome tuners plus Volume & Tone knobs
Removable lap steel stand and padded carry bag included
